Title: Relates to requiring school districts to post wellness policies on the school districts' website and requiring recess time for elementary school students
Summary: Relates to requiring school districts to post wellness policies on the school districts' website and requiring certain amounts of recess time for elementary school students.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring school districts to post wellness policies on the school district's website and requiring school districts to adopt a policy on recess for elementary school students
